content:
Hi all. Our Tuesday working sessions have yielded a couple block votes that we'll be bringing to FHIR-I on Monday...
• block-vote-1 containing 12 resolved comments
• block-vote-2-typo-fix containing 31 resolutions that are limited to typos, wording refinements and other straightforward fixes

I'll post the date these will be voted on by FHIR-I once that's been set.

We'll continue to meet weekly on Tuesdays at 1ET throughout April. Meeting details are on the HL7 calendar
Typos and other minor "Technical Corrections" don't need votes.

Ah, right. Thanks for the reminder, Dave.
I just reviewed the typo-fix group to confirm they all fit the technical correction category, and I renamed the group typo-fix for tracking.

So to correct my earlier post, we'll be bringing block-vote-1 to FHIR-I Monday and will inform them of the technical corrections applied.
